content:
Create all files needed including a docker-compose.yml file and use a single eff.org Certbot container to create and renew certificates from LetsEncrypt. The DNS is located at Google Domains and they issue a API-Key for each domain. Please allow for subdomains with the same key.
Please use credentials.yml file as the only data source for API-key, email and domains. 
Example: credentials.yml
credentials:
 credential1:
 api\_key: 
 email: user1@example.com
 domains:
 - example1.com
 - \*.example1.com
 credential2:
 api\_key: 
 email: user2@example.com
 domains:
 - example2.com
 - \*.example2.com

From the container, create a GoLang application to iterate the certbot command and pass all the API-keys and set of domains.
Also create a CRON job so it renews once per day.
Please print out all files with detailed instructions.
